content:
My name is Markus Peschl. Currently, I am a Master’s student of Applied Mathematics at the Delft University of Technology. On the theoretical side, my research interests lie in the intersection of stochastics and reinforcement learning.
As a consequence, I am interested in the study of uncertainty quantification for sequential decision making, Bayesian deep learning and optimal planning in partially observable environments.

title: Markus Peschl
